Package exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResultsNotFoundException
    Raised when for one query the result set is empty
    ReviewAlreadyInserted
    Raised when a review is already inserted
    ServerWinmagOufOfServiceException
    Contains the ServerWinmagOutOfServiceException that is raised if for some reason the Winmag website is down.
    UserNotPresentException
    Raised when a user doesn't exists
    WineNotExistsException
    Raised when a given wine doesn't exists
    WrongInsertionException
    Raised when user insert string instead of numbers or viceversa.
